response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe would be an excellent addition to your collection. This product holds significant value not only in monetary terms but also in its unique features and benefits that cater specifically to your needs. Given its exceptional quality and the fact that it's worth $1,000,000 to you, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This exclusive opportunity allows you to acquire this masterpiece at a reduced cost while still securing its full value and potential for appreciation. I trust that you will find this offer irresistible and look forward to discussing the details with you further.", "product_price": 950000}
